Talk1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat>The Great Fairy grants travelers a blessing
that gives them strong protection! Well,
that's what folks say, at least.
Talk1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy>It's a tremendous help to have both the
Great Fairy's blessings AND musical
entertainment!
Leave your troubles at the door, and
relax awhile.
Talk1003:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Chat_00>We're open all day, every day! Rain or
shine, day or night, you can count on us!
Talk1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>Did you come to see the Great
Fairy Kaysa?<sp:0:4:0>Unfortunately, she sealed herself away
after <clr:0000>the Upheaval<clr:ffff>. She hasn't come
out since.<sp:0:4:0>Before that, she used to make an
appearance from time to time. She's a big
fan of music, you know. Especially flutes.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>Why, when the <clr:0000>flutist Pyper<clr:ffff> came by,
she would poke her face out of her
fountain. It's been a long time though.
Talk1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01>She sure loved that <clr:0000>music group<clr:ffff> that used
to pass through. I wish they would come
by and <clr:0000>play for her<clr:ffff> again...
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:TalkPositive>Ah, my apologies. I was just thinking
out loud.<sp:0:4:0>Please, make yourself comfortable.
Talk1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Happy_01>You're the one who helped the <clr:0000>Great
Fairy Kaysa<clr:ffff>?! I'll be!<sp:0:4:0>You know, folks say that she grants
travelers a blessing that gives them
stronger protection.<sp:0:4:0>We're honored that the Great Fairy made
her home here.<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS_01>I'm so relieved that she's doing better.
Thank you, truly.
Talk1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Hello and welcome! Make sure to visit the
stable before you head out. That's just
common sense!
Talk1014:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Hello and welcome! Come on into the
stable before it gets dark. That's just
common sense!
Talk1020:
<sp:3:0:2:0b00><snd:SurpriseS>Excuse me! You should find shelter when
it's raining. That's just common sense!<sp:0:4:0>If you aren't careful, lightning will burn
you to a crisp!
Talk1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Hello and welcome! Come on into the
stable and get out of the dark. That's
just common sense!
Talk1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:Greeting_01>Hello and welcome! Head on into the
stable to get out of the rain. That's just
common sense!
Talk1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Chat_00>Whenever I have a bit of peace, I think
about my youngest daughter, Haite.<sp:0:4:0>She left to go work at <clr:0000>Highland Stable<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Ease>But that's about as <clr:0000>far south<clr:ffff> as you can
go and still be in Hyrule, so I don't get
to see her anymore...
Talk1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive>This is the home of the <clr:0000>Great Fairy Kaysa<clr:ffff>,
so you'll be safe with us!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>If you have a question about <clr:0000>horses<clr:ffff>,
you can ask at the <clr:0000>counter out front<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Or you can use the <clr:0000>counter inside<clr:ffff> if you
want to stay at the inn, of course.
Talk1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>This is Outskirt Stable, home of the <clr:0000>Great
Fairy Kaysa<clr:ffff>!<sp:0:4:0>If you have a question about <clr:0000>horses<clr:ffff>,
you can ask at the <clr:0000>counter out front<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>Or you can use the <clr:0000>counter inside<clr:ffff> if you
want to stay at the inn, of course.
